title: Dramatic Backlight
description: Dim hangar with strong rim lighting and atmospheric beams
searchTerms: dim hangar with strong rim lighting
prompt: Inside a dim hangar, a lone figure steps forward as a dominant rear key carves a bright rim around their silhouette. Ambient is tightly controlled; thin haze reveals defined beams that stretch across the floor. The subject pauses in near-silhouette, breathing visible in the light, with restrained flare glinting along the edge of the frame.
